snippet: More Americans than ever suffer from asthma, according to federal health officials. A lot more needs to be done to reduce the triggers and manage this disease.
abstract: Editorial contends that more must be done on a federal and local level to reduce environmental asthma triggers and to manage the disease; cites federal study showing that the percentage of Americans suffering from asthma reached a record high 8.4 percent in 2010, up from 7.3 percent in 2001.
lead_paragraph: More Americans than ever suffer from asthma, according to federal health officials. A lot more needs to be done to reduce the triggers and manage this disease.
